title: LFP Silver Duo
body:
Hey,
I am looking for a duo to climb the ranks with, anyone who wants to improve. Honestly, I don't care if you are bronze, or silver, but if you are serious, have a will to improve and play often, hit me up with a message here or in game. I can play whatever role, and as such can focus on improving a lane/pool of champs that would complement the duo partner (if they already main a lane/pool of champs). 
Cheers. 
IGN: Wackman.

replies.body: Hey, I would love to duo with you, I'm on silver 2 and keen for reaching gold by the end of the season. My IGN: craff3
